mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lararto_customer (board_num, title, ctnt, ctnt_img, iuser) VALUES (${board_num}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{ctnt_img}, ${iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.nickname, C.title AS productTitle, C.iboard FROM lagarto_customer A INNER JOIN lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN lagarto_main C ON A.product_num = C.iboard WHERE A.board_num = ${board_num} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
SELECT A.*, B.nickname, C.board_name FROM lagarto_customer A LEFT JOIN lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN lagarto_board_type C ON A.board_num = C.board_num WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard}
